alert.note: Alert for Marengo; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 10:37AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Marengo and southwestern Perry Counties through 1115 AM CDT... At 1037 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jefferson, or 8 miles west of Linden, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Demopolis, Linden, Uniontown, Jefferson, Thomaston, Sweet Water, Myrtlewood, Faunsdale, Dayton, Nanafalia, Consul, Surginer, Freddie Jones Field, Pin Hook, Magnolia, Wayne, Miller, Chickasaw State Park, Dixons Mill and Vineland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
